Uses of Interface
org.codeandmagic.timeline.EventVerticalLocator

Uses of EventVerticalLocator in org.codeandmagic.timeline
 

Classes in org.codeandmagic.timeline that implement EventVerticalLocator
 class DiagonalVerticalLocator
          An EventVerticalLocator which displays all events diagonally no matter the horizontal distance between them.
 class DodgeVerticalLocator
          Implementation of EventVerticalLocator in which events tend to be positioned on the middle of the available vertical space.
 class MiddleVerticalLocator
          Basic implementation for EventVerticalLocator which positions all events on the vertical middle of the timeline view.
 class PrecachedVerticalLocator
